name: Pixel Space
description:
Well, your space adventure has begun! In our game you will accomplish different missions- protect the friendly spaceships, combat against the waves of enemies, secure the transport ships, purchase the upgrades for your space ship, improving its weaponry and protection, and fight against the enemy bosses in an endless Universe!
Game features:
dynamic space battles with increasing complexity
an endless Universe
numerous possibilities of upgrading your space ship
complicated missions
Pixel graphics
